body: @Kirby Cosmico Sorry for the wait, I've been waiting for this moment. If I can spread the madness by helping you then count me in.

@Kirby Cosmico yeah! When L wiz went out to give a kappa a cucumber, we (having already seen your comment) took our chance and gave the book a pepper! It was super cool! Holes in everything! We only just had time to clean up before wiz came back! If we were purely physical in our nature some of us could of been hurt! One of the bullets even went all the way to the dungeon and killed one of Al*ah's prophet's! Shit was crazy!
Yes! Time for some stories! We haven't been this excited since we fed that book a hot pepper! Hell yeah!
I wanna tell a story about this topic but I don't think this is the right time, so... if you wanna read some interesting stories check my profile, I have some cool stuff there
